name: FOV Ventures
description: FOV Ventures invests in early-stage companies across Spatial Computing, AI, 3D, and Robotics, backing ambitious founders shaping the future of these industries.

name: Equilibrium Ventures
description: Equilibrium Ventures (EQV) is a venture capital firm backed by the Equilibrium Group, a world-class, blockchain-native organization of 80+ senior blockchain engineers across 25+ countries. EQV invests in early-stage blockchain infrastructure, including scaling technologies & real-world bridges that will drive web3 to the mainstream. EQV has launched its debut investment fund, Equilibrium Ventures Fund I.

name: Kvanted Ventures
description: Kvanted is an early-stage venture capital fund investing in Northern European companies with industry-changing software and hardware solutions. Our investment philosophy is rooted in accelerating industrial decarbonization and digital transformation, driven by powerful tailwinds from increased demand for industrial automation, sustainability, and supply chain resilience. As the next Industrial Revolution introduces new growth possibilities through groundbreaking technologies, we recognize the innovation potential of traditional European industries.
investmentAreas: industrial robotics, AI, autonomous systems and IoT solutions, circularity solutions, biomaterials, sustainable construction materials, energy efficiency solutions, data processing, sensing technology, logistics, procurement and marketplace solutions

name: Stephen Industries
description: We specialize in driving long-term growth for companies with high potential. As your partner, we offer flexible funding solutions together with strategic and operational advice and hands-on expertise on creating a global success story. We invest in start-ups and scale-ups operating in Finland and Europe. Our focus is on promising and innovative companies operating on three main verticals: Healthtech, Greentech, and Deeptech. We also invest outside these three – in short, the better the impact of your company or a technology is on the world, the better it fits our investment portfolio and the more we can help it on your journey towards long-term growth.

name: Sisu Ventures
description: Sisu Game Ventures is an exclusive advisory and investment company focused 100% on games. It was setup in 2014 by Paul Bragiel, Moaffak Ahmed and Samuli Syvähuoko and it focuses on the best gaming companies in the Nordic region and beyond.

name: NordicNinja
description: The largest Japanese VC in Europe backing companies tackling the world’s carbon footprint with a focus on climate tech, deeptech, and digital society. We are a team of founders and operators focusing on problem areas the world has to solve - from transportation to healthcare to a wide array of digital infrastructure – to decrease the vast carbon footprint. We serve founders with ambitious mission - investing in the future we want to live in. From its first €101 million Fund I launched in 2019, NordicNinja has made tens of investments, three of which have achieved unicorn status, with a handful showing similar potential. The portfolio includes companies that transformed industries including Bolt, Einride, Veriff, Voi, Starship, ClimateView, Kognic, Mavenoid, Pactum, Varjo, DappRadar and Ready Player Me. Half of the first fund’s investments are in mobility and transportation – an area with a massive carbon footprint, as well as inefficiency and poor user experience.

name: FOV Ventures
description: We invest at pre-seed and seed stage in founders building the Metaverse. FOV Ventures is the go-to fund in Europe for ambitious founders building a startup for the next era of compute. One that is more intelligent, more spatial and more human. We believe this is the next wave of billion dollar companies and have the expertise, conviction and global networks to find and support them from day zero.
investmentAreas: Metaverse, AR, AI, Creator Economy, E-Sports, Multiplayer

name: VNT Management
description: VNT Management, established in 2002, is a Finnish fund manager for three private equity funds. Funds and their sizes are Power Fund I, 16,9 million euros, Power Fund II, 62,8 million euros and Power Fund III, 77,0 million euros, totally 157 million euros. VNT funds focus on clean technology, in particular on renewable and distributed power generation and energy-saving technologies in electrical and power electronics applications. The funds invest in European early and growth phase companies. VNTM is a member of Finnish Venture Capital Association and complies with guidelines set to promote transparency in private equity and in venture capital industries. VNTM is under supervision of Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority and is registered in their AIFM register in 2015.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Metsa Spring
description: Metsä Group has its roots in the Finnish forests: our parent company Metsäliitto Cooperative is owned by over 90,000 forest owners. We use wood to make recyclable products for the day-to-day lives of millions of people globally. We focus on wood supply and forest services, wood products, pulp, paperboards, and tissue and greaseproof papers. We are committed to the principles of regenerative forestry to measurably strengthen the state of forest nature. We promote a culture of diversity, equality and inclusion. In 2023 our sales totaled EUR 6.1 billion, and we have around 9,500 employees.
investmentAreas: Advanced Materials, Biomass Energy, Biotechnology, Building Material, Business Development, Finance, Financial Services, Forestry

name: Vertical.vc
description: We stimulate growth through collaborative, strategic and transactional services. Our key expertise are: Market Intelligence, Transaction Advisory, Service Design, Innovation Strategy, Collaboration Projects and venture Building. In the early days of Vertical, we supported startups to become the best versions of themselves. We were great at what we did, yet along the way we noticed the changing needs of the market, and realised we could offer something even better. We adapted and grew into a new space, to focus on strategic development and using collaboration as a tool. When it comes to growth, strategy and collaboration, we don't just talk the talk: we walk the walk too.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Industrial, Sports, Wellness

name: Metsa Spring
description: Metsä Group has its roots in the Finnish forests: our parent company Metsäliitto Cooperative is owned by over 90,000 forest owners. We use wood to make recyclable products for the day-to-day lives of millions of people globally. We focus on wood supply and forest services, wood products, pulp, paperboards, and tissue and greaseproof papers. We are committed to the principles of regenerative forestry to measurably strengthen the state of forest nature. We promote a culture of diversity, equality and inclusion. In 2023 our sales totaled EUR 6.1 billion, and we have around 9,500 employees.
investmentAreas: Advanced Materials, Biomass Energy, Biotechnology, Building Material, Business Development, Finance, Financial Services, Forestry

name: VNT Management
description: VNT Management, established in 2002, is a Finnish fund manager for three private equity funds. Funds and their sizes are Power Fund I, 16,9 million euros, Power Fund II, 62,8 million euros and Power Fund III, 77,0 million euros, totally 157 million euros. VNT funds focus on clean technology, in particular on renewable and distributed power generation and energy-saving technologies in electrical and power electronics applications. The funds invest in European early and growth phase companies. VNTM is a member of Finnish Venture Capital Association and complies with guidelines set to promote transparency in private equity and in venture capital industries. VNTM is under supervision of Finnish Financial Supervisory Authority and is registered in their AIFM register in 2015.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Renewable Energy, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Grid.vc
description: Grid.vc is an early-stage venture capital company that focuses on new and emerging start-up and growth enterprises working with the energy sector and its customer interfaces. Grid.vc has access to electricity and power grids as well as power plants. We have possibility to offer pilot projects to startups and give industry insight with decades of energy sector expertise.
investmentAreas: energy, clean tech, SaaS, infrastructure, and technology

name: Trifecta Retail Ventures
description: Trifecta is a group of independent businesses. The businesses are: DealDash, an inventory liquidation specialist founded in 2008 - the world's largest auction site; Galton Voysey, a private equity firm focused on e-commerce businesses with one thing in common - being customer obsessed; Sterling Pacific, a manufacturer of full aluminum travel cases acquired in 2019 and fail ventures, our in-house venture studio.

name: Trifecta Retail Ventures
description: Trifecta is a group of independent businesses. The businesses are: DealDash, an inventory liquidation specialist founded in 2008 - the world's largest auction site; Galton Voysey, a private equity firm focused on e-commerce businesses with one thing in common - being customer obsessed; Sterling Pacific, a manufacturer of full aluminum travel cases acquired in 2019 and fail ventures, our in-house venture studio.

name: Greencode Ventures
description: Greencode Ventures is a digital-first green transition venture capital firm supporting startups that have a positive environmental and social impact while building scalable profitable businesses. We focus on sustainable investments as in article 9 of Regulation (EU) 2019/2088 on sustainability-related disclosures in the financial sector (‘SFDR’). We focus on companies whose products or services inherently contribute towards our sustainable investment objective.
investmentAreas: clean energy, information technology, clean technology, climate technology, infrastructure, micro-mobility & mobility technology

name: Evli Growth Partners
description: Evli Growth Partners is a European later-stage VC based in Helsinki, Finland, investing in Series B with initial investments of 5-10 M€. We are entrepreneurial-led fund, backed by 5 serial entrepreneurs, and we have experience from +150 companies with +2 B€ of aggregate exit value.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Korpun Siemen
description: Korpun Siemenen's first investment in the target company is €50,000-100,000 and it can make further investments in subsequent rounds up to a total investment of €200,000.In the past, we have focused on making investments in later-stage companies, and the same investors have together invested more than 60 million euros in SijõttaPRO CF, in more than 70 companies. Now we are expanding our operations through Korpu Siemenen also to the earlier stage companies.

name: Nexit Ventures
description: Nexit Ventures is a technology growth capital firm focused on digital disruption. We invest primarily in disruptive and scalable European growth companies. We have our home bases in the Nordic countries and Silicon Valley creating a transatlantic bridge. The continuous and active presence on both sides of the Atlantic connects technologies, markets, partners, resources, and exit opportunities, creating significant value for our portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Mobile, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Failup Ventures
description: Failup Ventures is a Finnish-American venture capital fund based in New York and Helsinki. We invest in early-stage startups with strong, mission-driven teams. The typical initial investment is $200K-$1M with the capability to follow up with larger tickets. Failup was founded by three young exited founders and angel investors, with experience in building and investing in over 40 startups. Our LPs consist of some of the world's most successful startup founders including several unicorns founders.

name: Tikura Ventures
description: Tikura provides a unique set of expertise in the areas of strategy development product, concept and business model development, as well as mobile communications and innovation management. For startup companies we are an active investor with willingness and capabilities to develop the startup into the growth path.
investmentAreas: B2G, B2B2C, blue economy, wearables, big data, biotech, healthtech

name: Liquido.VC
description: We help Finnish startups in raising pre-seed and seed financing rounds. From building the pitch deck to closing the round. We are building our own portfolio as we invest in our clients businesses. For startups, we are a one stop shop for financing. For investors, we are the dealflow they dream of.

name: Sparkmind.vc
description: We are Sparkmind.vc, a Nordic venture capital company solely focused on EdTech. We invest in teams transforming early childhood, K12, higher, secondary and vocational education as well as corporate and lifelong learning. - Our fund, EUR 55m in size was launched in Jan 2020 - Our geographic sweet spot in Northern Europe, while having European wide mandate - We invest from pre-seed to series A - Initial investments typically in the range of EUR 500k - 1.5m - Follow-on capacity up to EUR 5.5m per company.

name: Wave Ventures
description: Wave Ventures provides pre seed funding for extremely promising startups in the Nordics. Supporting the next wave of Gen Z founders from the Nordics. The company also offers a range of innovative products and services including sustainable plastics,
investmentAreas: B2B, B2C, financial services, healthcare, and technology

name: Ajanta
description: Ajanta is an international investment management company that targets companies in various sectors and stages of their lifecycles, providing services to help businesses grow and succeed.

name: Visionplus
description: Vision+ invests into digital products such as applications, games and services in all digital platforms. Vision+ investment model is based on revenue share financing where investor return consist of royalties of the product cash flow targeting fast circulation of capital.Vision+ does not dilute existing shareholders Vision+ finances product development and marketing focusing on acquiring customers and creating cash-flow. Typical investment size of Vision+ is 50 000 - ­500 000 euros (70 000 - 700 000 USD)
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Digital Signage, Venture Capital

name: Nordic Development Fund
description: Nordic Development Fund (NDF) is a joint Nordic international finance institution (IFI), established in 1988 by the Nordic five countries - Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, and Sweden. NDF's work focuses on the nexus between climate change and development in lower-income countries and countries in fragile situations. NDF provides concessionary financing with an active portfolio of over 542 million EUR. Together with our strategic partners, we develop, launch and scale high-impact projects to support developing countries and people vulnerable to climate change.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Helmet Capital
description: Helmet Capital is a responsible private equity investor that focuses on investing in successful domestic companies. We make direct majority investments in small and medium-sized enterprises, utilizing the funds of individuals, family businesses, and institutional investors within our network. For our portfolio companies, we provide broad industry expertise and knowledge to support growth in various situations, including market consolidations, generational transitions, internationalization, and growth financing. We participate actively in the operations of our portfolio companies, primarily engaging at a strategic level, and when needed, we also provide support and consultation to management in operational matters. We are driven by the desire to enable the success of our target companies and investor partners and create an environment where everyone can reach their full potential.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Reaktor Ventures
description: Reaktor Ventures is laser-focused helping seed stage companies become global leaders. The best business models are simple. Ours is no different. We want to invest our time and money into the best seed stage companies and help them create new markets and become global leaders in their industry. We take pride in making all Reaktor's 300 professional available for our companies for free. There is no limits. We want to help as long as you want our support. We invest from tens of thousands all the way up to one million euro. We are based in Helsinki, Finland but invest in companies around the world.
investmentAreas: Financial Services, Service Industry, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: IPR.VC
description: IPR.VC connects institutional investors with high-quality original film and TV content assets. IPR.VC invests in TV and film content in North America, the UK and Europe IPR.VC Funds have a proven investment model and verified track of substantial fast distributions to its investors and attractive risk-return ratio The media content business does not correlate with general economic cycles and other asset classes, so the fund offers an avenue for diversifying investment portfolio Investors include fund-of-funds, pension and insurance investors, foundations and family offices Our latest IPR.VC Fund III is a sustainable fund complying with SFDR Article 8
investmentAreas: Content Creators, Digital Media, Media and Entertainment

name: Nuard Ventures
description: Founded in 2006, Nuard Ventures is a venture capital investment firm based in Helsinki, Finland. The firm seeks to make investments in the artificial intelligence, gaming, and e-commerce sectors

name: 8 Media Ventures
description: 8 Media Ventures invests media-for-equity in high growth D2C companies. We offer advertising space from our market leading media partners. Together with our network and know-how in building high-growth brands, we act as a sales catalyst for the companies we invest in. We make minority investments in early-stage companies with their base in the Nordics and ambition to scale. We look for companies with strong brand potential, great talent in key positions, a proven go-to-market model and sound unit economics.
investmentAreas: Financial Services, Impact Investing, D2C, B2C

name: Voima Ventures
description: Voima Ventures helps founders accelerate the growth of deep technology ventures to global markets. We shed light on the ideas and technology that require time and courage to build. The way we work is simple: we combine science-driven innovation together with the Nordic serial entrepreneurial experience and a global mindset.

name: Prodeko Ventures
description: Prodeko Ventures is a development company founded by Tuotantotouluiden kilta Prodeko and Prodeko Alumni, which started operations in 2015. The company's goal is to help Prodeko growth companies and individuals succeed and grow. Prodeko Ventures realizes its goal by making early-stage investments in companies with Prodeko key personnel.

name: Nordic Foodtech VC
description: We invest in early-stage companies aiming to radically renew the food system – from the soil to the orbit and from new sources of protein to better ways of eating. The fund was launched in 2020 and has 42M€ to invest in approximately 20 companies in the Nordics and Baltics.

name: Gorilla Capital
description: We believe in probabilities and statistics, not luck. We rigorously follow our investment criteria and diversify our investments across 100 companies. That is why the risk is lower than in average VC and we can even talk about likely returns. We invest in startups that prefer a cautious and calculated approach to risk. We call these entrepreneurs camels - the ambitious yet resilient players in the startup landscape. For us the camel characterizes the way the company makes its startup journey - displaying curiosity and intelligence and having a remarkable ability to successfully reach their destinations. They use resources efficiently, navigate steadily through diverse market conditions and quickly adapt to changing environment.

name: Straightforward Capital
description: Straightforward Capital is a venture capital company that helps companies to unleash their growth potential. Straightforward Capital invests into companies that are in their early growth stage. We consider Finnish high-tech sector as our home market. Our fund acquires minority stakes in technology companies and plays an active role in their strategic planning and development. During the investment process we have always the ambition to be the leading investor and add value to this process by our experience. Our initial investments range from 500 thousand to 2 million euros.
investmentAreas: Funding Platform, Impact Investing, UAV, nanomaterials, drones, data platforms

name: Icebreaker.vc
description: Welcome to Icebreaker.vc. We want to be the best in supporting people to start, build and join strong tech companies and here's what we do: - We invest in teams in Finland, Estonia and Sweden - No stage is too early for us to invest in - Our initial investments range from €150-800k - We're always eager to hear from ambitious and diverse teams We have invested in over 70 companies with domain expert founders from companies like Rovio, Pipedrive, Spotify, Wise and Veriff.
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Innovestor
description: Innovestor was founded in 2014 to solve a very tangible problem for technology entrepreneurs: lack of capital for growing the business. At the same time, we had identified an increasing demand among private investors to gain access to promising early-stage technology startups. Our first product, an online co-investment platform, was developed and brought to market to address this opportunity. The business gained traction, and our community grew. We were able to attract ambitious founders and smart investors to the platform. Meanwhile, we had reached another conclusion: a more impactful way to support founders is by backing the lifecycle of a company, not just a single round of funding. For achieving that at meaningful scale, the most suitable model is a VC fund.
investmentAreas: Angel Investment, Finance, Financial Services, Venture Capital

name: Green Campus Innovations Oy
description: Green Campus Innovations is a new business developer and cleantech seed investor, supported by shareholders including LUT University, Saimaa University of Applied Sciences, LUT Research Foundation, and Vitako Association.

name: Vendep Capital
description: Vendep Capital is a B2B SaaS specialist VC operating in the Nordics and Baltics. They invest in the best early stage software entrepreneurs, providing funding ranging from 0.1–3M euros depending on the stage.

name: Lagoon Capital
description: Lagoon Capital is a global investment firm financing high growth companies. Lagoon Capital invests also to venture capital and buyout funds as well as to listed companies. Lagoon Capital, established in 2007, supports technology companies with capital investment, expertise, and custom support to accelerate growth and success.
investmentAreas: Asset Management, Consulting, Finance, Wealth Management

name: Butterfly Ventures
description: Since 2012 Butterfly Ventures team has invested into ~100 early-stage companies. Our business track record is strong, and we take an active stance in supporting the startups from early on. Most of them do not have any revenue at the time of our entry, and we are often the first VC to get on board. Here’s a few more companies from our active portfolio along with selected exits and other venture capital investments that are managed by Butterfly Ventures team. Feel free to explore them further.

name: Superhero Capital
description: Superhero Capital: Early-stage VC investing in insight-driven startups from Finland and the Baltics, empowering founders to be superheroes with funding up to 1M€.

name: Nordic Venture Family
description: Our companies have started with nothing but curiosity. From media production, deep learning and decentralised technologies to generative AI — we love to solve complex problems and create successful businesses around them.

name: Monttu Ventures
description: Monttu Ventures is a pro-bono development company focusing on early-stage startups founded by individuals with a background in the University of Turku, Åbo Akademi, Turku University of Applied Sciences, or Novia University of Applied Sciences. With 78 co-founders and over 730 000€ capital, we help promising companies by sharing the expertise of our shareholders and leveraging the services of our business partners. Additionally, we can invest in the most potential companies.

name: Nordic XR Startups
description: Investor and accelerator/incubator for VR/AR Startups in the Nordic region. We offer participating startups equity investment, mentorship opportunities, workspaces, and back-office services.

name: SijoittajaPRO
description: We finance Finnish growth companies with instruments varying from debt to equity. In the last 7 years we have invested over 100 MEUR in Finnish growth companies with our anchor investors.

name: Aboa Advest
description: Aboa Advest is a family-owned investment company focusing on startups and other growth companies. Founded in 2015, we have been particularly interested in impact investing: Impact investing generates a beneficial social or environmental impact, as well as a financial return. (*) We are an active investor in Finnish growth companies. We revised our investment strategy in January 2020: our primary focus is to invest in Venture Capital funds. To date we have invested in two buyout funds and five VC funds, adding value in DeepTech startups. Our investment strategy is based on a long-term perspective: we expect a significant return on our investments in 10 years time.
investmentAreas: Business Development, Financial Services, Impact Investing, sustainability

name: Tesi
description: Tesi (Finnish Industry Investment Ltd) is a state-owned investment company that invests on market terms both in venture capital and private equity funds, and directly in startups, scale-ups, and large industrial projects.
investmentAreas: Not limited to specific themes or sectors

name: Guida Invest
description: Broadgate Capital is an international fund manager with focus on real estate, developments, delivery of turn key projects and service solutions for the real estate industry within the Baltic States of Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania. us extensive experience and a broad network of co-operation partners.

name: 3TS Capital Partners
description: 3TS Capital Partners is one of the leading European technology focused growth capital firms. 3TS provides expansion capital and buyout funding for small and medium-sized businesses in growth sectors including Technology & Internet, Media & Communications and Technology-Enabled Services. Investors in the current and past 3TS funds totalling over €300 million include EIF, EBRD, Cisco, OTP, Sitra, 3i and KfW among others.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Information Technology, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: OpenOcean
description: OpenOcean is a pan-European early-stage Venture Capital investor with offices in Helsinki and London. Our investment strategy focuses on leading or co-leading Series A investments with initial ticket sizes up to €5m in European companies driving the data economy, including B2B platforms and Enterprise Software technology. Our founding team members include key persons behind MySQL AB (sold to Sun Microsystems Inc. for $1 Billion in 2008), after which the team jointly built category leader MariaDB Corporation Ab, as well as forming and managing OpenOcean.
investmentAreas: B2B, Big Data, Enterprise Software, Quantum Computing, Software, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Maki.vc
description: Maki.vc is a seed-stage VC firm dedicated to partnering with founders who never conform to category standards. From inception to series A and beyond, we partner with deep tech and brand driven companies obsessed in challenging category norms.

name: Inventure
description: Inventure is the early-stage VC that knows how to get Nordic and Baltic founders to the next level. Since 2005, the team has been in venture with over 90 companies ranging from deep tech to consumer internet brands, including Wolt, Swappie, Stravito and Jobbatical. With its €377 million of assets under management, Inventure focuses on Seed and Series A investments across Nordics and Baltics, with offices in Helsinki and Stockholm.

name: Lifeline Ventures
description: Lifeline Ventures is a Helsinki-based early-stage VC. Founded by serial entrepreneurs, we work with early-stage companies in funding, sales, technology, strategy, and operations. Lifeline Ventures invests in future category-leading companies with strong founders. To date, we have invested in over 100 companies. Our investment ticket size ranges from 100 kEUR to 2 mEUR and we participate in angel, seed and series A rounds.
investmentAreas: climate technology, consumer, finance, games, hardware, health, and software sectors
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Raison
description: We are happy to present you the project RAISON - a unique platform for operations with investments and personal finance, using algorithms of artificial intelligence. The platform allows you to store fiat and crypto-currency assets in one place, to invest in products associated with blockchain technology, to analyze your own financial state, and also has an application for everyday life, which enables, for instance, paying for purchases with virtual cards via Apple Pay and sharing accounts for dinner.
investmentAreas: Cryptocurrency, Financial Services, FinTech, Personal Finance, Wealth Management

name: Sitra
description: Sitra is the venture capital investment arm of Sitra specializing in investments in seed, start-ups, early stage opportunities, and other funds. The firm invests through its three programmes namely, Health Care Programme, the Food and Nutrition Programme, and the Environmental Programme. Within the Health Care Programme, investments are focused on companies engaged in paper-free health care, seamless services, decentralised specialised health care, and support services. Within the Food and Nutrition Programme, investments are made in enterprises engaged in the food and nutrition sector, including value-adding upgrading of raw materials and new applications and service concepts in food and nutrition technology.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, FinTech, Venture Capital
fundingStage: Pre-Seed / Seed, Series A/B, Series C & Beyond

name: Helen Ventures
description: Helen Ventures invests in the most innovative and transformative startups in the energy, e-mobility, circular economy, decarbonization, and digital solutions space. We accelerate the growth of early and growth stage companies by developing world class solutions in collaboration with our customers and industry experts. Helen Ventures is the corporate venture capital arm of Helen Ltd., an energy company making the possibilities of a new energy era accessible to all.

name: Nordic XR Startups
description: Nordic XR Startups offers participating startups equity investment, mentorship opportunities, workspaces, and back-office services. Contributing to the Nordic VR/AR ecosystem and accelerating the growth of our investment portfolio companies. Pre-seed/seed investment up to 100k€. 6 months of acceleration. World-class mentors. Business and Back Office support. Get to Slush, attend Demo Days to network with investors and partners.
investmentAreas: Banking, Financial Services, FinTech, Venture Capital

name: EnergySpin
description: They spin the energy companies to the next level. EnergySpin started as an innovative platform to share ideas and trends and developed into a multi corporate accelerator program, supporting startups to grow, connecting them to corporates and helping them to challenge the status quo of the industry. In EnergySpin we believe in the power of innovative ideas, dedicated and hardworking entrepreneurs who are passionate to make the difference.

name: Kiuas
description: Kiuas is the #1 startup accelerator in Finland, supporting 50+ startups/year on their journey from an idea to first revenue. Kiuas enables early-stage startup founders to successfully build companies that change the world for the better. We empower founders to learn and grow with world-class support, connections, and resources for their startup journey from idea to fast growth.

name: Kielo Growth
description: Kielo Startup Investor and Business Incubator. Kielo Growth is an angel investor collective investing technology and industry agnostically in aspiring startups. We are also managing North Finland's biggest startup and growth company community and hub next to University of Oulu in Teknologiakylä.
investmentAreas: Communities, Computer, Consulting, Consumer Electronics, Information Technology

name: Yle Media Start Accelerator
description: We provide comprehensive support, including mentorship, resources, and industry insights, to help startups refine and scale their media-related innovations. At Yle Media Startup Accelerator, we aim to drive the success of forward-thinking media ventures.
investmentAreas: Digital Media, Financial Services, Incubators, Mentoring, Funding

name: xEdu
description: xEdu is an accelerator that works with startups creating transformative learning solutions in the education sector.We provide mentorship, resources, and a collaborative network to drive innovation and growth. At xEdu, we are committed to advancing education through cutting-edge technologies and impactful ideas."
investmentAreas: Education, Social Entrepreneurship, Accelerator, EdTech, and Coaching

name: Vertical.vc
description: We help companies innovate through collaboration and co-creation. We believe there is more to gain by working together, rather than doing it alone or starting from scratch. In a nutshell, we help you connect, brainstorm, develop or launch with others. Whether it is a start-up, a corporate, another business units of your organization
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Health Care, Industrial, Sports, Wellness

name: Venture Gym
description: Venture Gym is a global development and management of business operations and services firm. Venture Gym is an expert company that is focused on developing customers' business conditions. The history of Venture Gym Oy dates back to 2010, when the first business acceleration training aimed at start-up companies was implemented.
investmentAreas: Business Development, Incubators, Management Consulting, Financial Services, Investments

name: Gorilla Ventures
description: Gorilla Ventures is a startup accelerator and seed fund based in Helsinki, Finland. We believe in probabilities and statistics, not luck. We rigorously follow our investment criteria and diversify our investments across 100 companies. That is why the risk is lower than in average VC and we can even talk about likely returns.
investmentAreas: Venture Capital, Start-up incubation, Venture Fund, Change management

name: Green Campus Innovations Oy
description: Provide an effective, outsourced incubation and acceleration platform . Green Campus Innovations. A new business developer and cleantech seed investor. Our new business development system is based on a continuous and systematic End-to-End development process and active Corporate Venture Programs.
investmentAreas: Clean energy, Sustainable, Industrial symbiosis, CleanTech, Investor

name: Business Finland
description: Business Finland is the public provider for innovation funding, and services for internationalization and travel promotion. Business Finland is the Finnish government organization for innovation funding and trade, travel and investment promotion. Business Finland's 600 experts work in 40 offices globally and in 16 regional offices around Finland. Business Finland is part of the Team Finland network.
investmentAreas: Innovation Funding, Trade, Travel, Investment Promotion

name: Business Joensuu
description: Joensuu Science Park Business Incubator helps to implement the business ideas and guides companies. Start or grow your business in the Joensuu and Central Karelia region – network with us for info, support and expertise! Business Joensuu operates in the Joensuu area and Central Karelia. We offer companies and entrepreneurs versatile services that match their needs at all stages of their operations.

description: We invest in inspiring innovations driven by true entrepreneurs. Lets accelerate the productization to make a global impact. Together with the entrepreneurs we are the ecosystem where great ideas can fly. With the ecosystem the resources will scale to meet the growing demand.

name: Arctic15 Pitching Competition
description: Arctic15 Pitching Competition invests in startups. Established in 2007, Arctic Startup stands as a stalwart force, dedicated to empowering startups to confront global challenges by seamlessly connecting founders with capital, talent, expertise, and clients through our media outlets and events. As the catalyst behind Arctic15 and Nordeep acclaimed as the foremost startup conference in the Nordics and embraced by startups, businesses, and investors, we remain at the forefront of values-led matchmaking Startup Conferences.
